column1: #Text=Zuko says : " How did you know I was here ? "
#Text=Mai says : " Because I know you so well . "
#Text=Zuko says : " But , how - " Mai says : " The warden 's my uncle , you idiot .
#Text=" Dear Mai , I 'm sorry you that you have to find out this way , but I 'm leaving . "
#Text=" Mai says : " Thanks Zuko , that makes me feel all better .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Mai , I never wanted to hurt you .
#Text=But I have to do this to save my country .
#Text=" Zuko says : " That 's not how I see it .
